title: “We Need to Make Time” with Alice Waters
description:
Evelyn Griesse reveals why she believes in fate. Then Max talks with Alice Waters about what she has learned over 50 years of running Chez Panisse, her legendary restaurant, and why she’s not afraid to pass it on to the next generation of chefs. 
--
Learn more about Evelyn Griesse’s work with The South Dakota Access for Every Woman Fund
